snippet.title: 88 Heroes Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: 88 Heroes is a chaotic 2D platformer that is as fun to watch as it is to play, where each level completed or untimely death brings a new uniquely skilled hero into the action. With just 88 minutes to complete all 88 levels, you’ll need every one of the 88 heroes to stop the dastardly Dr. H8 destroying the Earth! Are you up to the challenge? http://www.twitter.com/88heroesgame http://www.88heroes.com
